protocol.name: P-G5625-1
protocol.text: At day 16, stress treatment started at 3 hours of light treatment Genotoxic stress (1.5μg/ml bleomycin + 22 μg/ml mitomycin), Group Puchta. Bleomycin + mitomycin were added to the indicated concentration in the Media. To add the reagents the raft was lifted out A magnetic stir bar and a stirrer were used to mix the media and the added reagents. After the rafts were put back in the boxes, they were transferred back to the climate chamber.
